TEXT.TITLE: GENERAL PHYSICS <GPHY> FORMS NEW UNIT
TEXT.BODY: General Physics Corp said it has formed a new business unit called HP Technical Services to furnish health physics technicians and radiological engineers and scientists to the electric utility industry for use in nuclear power plants. Reuter
